div.p: To request for change method of payment to bank auto-debit arrangement (ADA) or direct debit, kindly attach the following:

ul.li: Duly accomplished and signed 2 copies of ADA Enrollment Form (BDO or HSBC) by the Life Insured and the Policyowner;
Clear copy of proof of bank account (i.e., Passbook, ATM card, check book, bank statement, deposit slip, bank certificate)
Enroll in e-ADA via bank's website or mobile app
Screenshot of proof of e-ADA enrollment from the bank's website or mobile app
Duly accomplished and signed copy of Privacy Notice and Consent form by the Life Insured and the Policyowner

div.p: Additional requirements may be requested after your submission is reviewed.
